description: A grip and a stock attached to a joining mount.  Can be attached to the M26 underbarrel shotgun to make it usable as a standalone shotgun, without requiring another gun to mount it on.

variants.description: A modular assembly of a pistol grip and a stock mounted on top of an inert AR-15-style buffer tube.  Can be attached to the M26-MASS in its underbarrel configuration in order to run it as a standalone shotgun.  <variant:black>

description: A modern compact shotgun intended for breaching doors and close quarters combat.  Currently in the standalone configuration, ready to be fire independently.  Disassemble to return it to the underbarrel configuration, where it can be mounted to another gun.

variants.description: A compact magazine-fed bolt-action shotgun.  A modern alternative to the Masterkey, this shotgun has been issued to Army breaching units, and is therefore more widely available than its predecessor.  It is currently in its standalone configuration and is ready to fire.  Disassemble to detach the stock assembly and turn it into an underbarrel configuration.  <variant:black>
